verses.name: Deuteronomy 33:1
verses.text: And this is the blessing, wherewith Moses the man of God blessed the children of Israel before his death.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 33:2
verses.text: And he said, The Lord came from Sinai, and rose up from Seir unto them; he shined forth from mount Paran, and he came with ten thousands of saints: from his right hand went a fiery law for them.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 33:3
verses.text: Yea, he loved the people; all his saints are in thy hand: and they sat down at thy feet; every one shall receive of thy words.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 33:4
verses.text: Moses commanded us a law, even the inheritance of the congregation of Jacob.
